hero.core_tension: Choose activating store-as-studio media now to protect margin during Nov 18â€“Dec 02 versus defaulting to deeper holiday markdowns.
hero.setting: Retail floor staged as a small studio: low-footprint pop-up platform, stacked signage panels, open backroom planning table. Composition: low-angle, three-quarter view that shows both storefront glass and the plan table. Materials: matte metal frame, linen-surface planning sheets.
hero.persona: Head of Retail (deciding between markdowns and a media-led creator pop-up)
hero.action: Approving a short creator slot schedule and pricing a sellable in-store ad unit on printed CPM sheets
hero.urgency_symbol: Narrow bands of light across the floor implying a countdown to the high-value window
props: Printed per-visit media revenue sheet labeled 'vs markdown baseline'
Creator roster on paper, short-duration set cards
Sample QR redemption cards and shelf tags
hero.lighting: Polished editorial: confident highlights on the operator and media panels, deep clean negative space around the pop-up
hero.alt: Head of Retail approving a store-as-studio creator pop-up test

signal_map.structure: Concentric rings (street, storefront, in-store attention, checkout) with a vertical measurement spine down the center. Overlaid lattice of creator nodes and brand ad tokens. Embedded percentage anchors on rings.
elements: Creator nodes as small podium tokens
Brand ad tokens placed on inner ring
QR redemption tokens clustered near checkout
Measurement spine with per-visit media revenue and markdown cost-per-buyer markers
signal_map.motion: Curved paths show attention funneling from street ring into the in-store attention ring, splitting into purchase and media revenue channels. Geometry highlights tradeoffs between footfall lift and media yield.
signal_map.palette: Matte retail greys, neutral stone, accent safety yellow and copper highlights to mark targets and thresholds. Materials: paper tokens, soft-shadowed wood podiums.
signal_map.alt: CMO and analytics lead mapping footfall lift and QR redemption targets

case_studies.scene: Back-of-store ops desk where a Store Operations Lead configures sellable in-store ad units and a four-hour creator slot.
case_studies.moment: The lead compares printed CPM for in-store media to local digital CPM and annotates incremental gross margin per visit on a margin calculator card.
case_studies.persona: Store Operations Lead executing the 'In-store media as margin lever' test
props: Fold-out margin calculator with markdown baseline column
Small mock ad panel (matte material) labeled with price tiers
case_studies.lighting: Directed editorial light on the calculator and ad panel, cooler fill on surrounding shelves to isolate the test focal point.
case_studies.alt: Store Ops Lead testing sellable in-store ad slots and measuring conversion lift

case_studies.scene: Micro-event area near store entrance: a creator hosts a 30-minute demo while a Partnerships Lead watches guest sign-ups and QR scans.
case_studies.moment: A realtime tally card shows QR redemptions and early-window buyer IDs moving into a 'full-price purchase' column.
case_studies.persona: Partnerships Lead running a creator-led event to shift early-window buyer share
props: Guest list clipboard with early-window share targets
Stack of QR redemption cards and loyalty sign-up forms
Compact tally board showing event CPA target bands
case_studies.lighting: Warm, editorial spotlight on the creator and tally board; ambient soft light on the crowd to suggest attention without clutter.
case_studies.alt: Partnerships Lead running creator pop-up, tracking QR redemptions and early-window purchases
